name: Heroes Frontier - Endless Idle Clicker RPG Games
name_original: Heroes Frontier - Endless Idle Clicker RPG Games
description:
Your legend begins from here! Summon the strongest heroes in history and team them up to fight against the evil priest!

Explore the ancient tribe of Phoenix and save it from the time and space disorder. As a powerful leader, you have to collect all the Phoenix Feather together and set everything back into peace!

FEATURES:
·Totally automatical battle control and exciting battle animations!
·Over 100 legendary heroes and epic equipments to collect, evolve and summon. All of them are beautifully crafted with their own fighting style!
·12 Zodiac Upgrades for you to strengthen your leader. Justice will be done by the will from above!
·PVP Arena mode for powerful and tactful players from worldwide to combat in! Are you ready to be the King of the world?
·Daily and weekly events for you to claim various rewards!

The future of world is now in your hand! Being the savior or the boss of this world is your own choice!
